alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 12:32PM MDT until November 03 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light snow continues through the afternoon. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches, with 4 to 8 inches on Casper Mountain. Northeast wind 10 to 20 mph. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range, Natrona County Lower Elevations, and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...Through 6 PM MDT today. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the afternoon commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional afternoon snowfall of around one inch is possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
